Learn the mechanics behind Market Maker: Learn the mechanics behind Market Maker gamma hedging
When GEX is positive, Market Makers trad: When GEX is positive, Market Makers trade "against" the move. They buy dips and sell rallies to keep their delta neutral. This compresses volatility and leads to mean reversion.
When GEX is negative, Market Makers trad: When GEX is negative, Market Makers trade "with" the move. They must sell as the market falls and buy as it rises. This creates aggressive momentum and explosive volatility.
GEX is the primary force behind price at: GEX is the primary force behind price attraction and repulsion in modern electronic markets.
Market Pinning occurs when the gravity o: Market Pinning occurs when the gravity of a specific strike (usually a convergent Call/Put Wall) "traps" the price during the final hours of trading.
High directional volume. GEX walls can b: High directional volume. GEX walls can be broken easily.
Magnets begin to emerge. Start watching: Magnets begin to emerge. Start watching for convergent walls.
Golden Window. Institutional positions a: Golden Window. Institutional positions are locked. Gamma acceleration is at peak.
The Magnet Effect. Price is mechanically: The Magnet Effect. Price is mechanically sucked into the strike.
Vanna measures how GEX changes with Vola: Vanna measures how GEX changes with Volatility (IV). If Net Vanna is positive, as IV drops, Dealers are forced to buy stocks to remain neutral (The Vanna Rally).
Charm measures how Dealer delta changes: Charm measures how Dealer delta changes as time passes. For 0DTE, this effect is massive in the final hours, forcing buying/selling purely based on the clock.

Apply these concepts using the Real-Time: Apply these concepts using the Real-Time GEX HUD on the dashboard.
Pinning does not happen at once; it has: Pinning does not happen at once; it has an optimal time window where data shifts from "noisy" to "predictive".
Market still has directional volume. GEX: Market still has directional volume. GEX walls exist but can be broken by news or order flow.
Start watching the Pinning Target. If co: Start watching the Pinning Target. If consistent, real confidence is higher than displayed.
Institutional decisions are made. Gamma: Institutional decisions are made. Gamma grows exponentially. If confidence >70%, high probability.
The Final Magnet Effect (3:30 PM - Close: The Final Magnet Effect (3:30 PM - Close)
In the last 30 minutes, sharp moves ofte: In the last 30 minutes, sharp moves often occur as the market is "sucked" into the Pinning Target.
If at 3:45 PM price is slightly off the: If at 3:45 PM price is slightly off the Pinning Target but HUD shows SOLID confidence, that is an opportunity for a mean reversion trade toward the wall strike.
